                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Send keys to the textbox (with time to pause execution)
        Parameters:
        element - WebElement
        value - value String value need to input
        timer - no of seconds to stop execution (for ex. 5, will stop execution for 5 seconds)
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
